name: haddock
headline: SaaS helping restaurants improve their margins through cost control.
description:
haddock is a fintech SaaS that helps restaurants improve their margins thanks to real-time cost control. We use Artificial Intelligence and Optical Character Recognition to digitize documents, export all data, and bring it to the restaurant in real-time.
It is as simple as taking a picture of an invoice and uploading it. We also integrate with several different POS, making it even easier. We help discover restaurants’ P&L, margins, price variations, and many more business insights. Thanks to haddock restaurants can control price variations and make better business decisions based on real-time updated data.

founders.name: Arnau Navarro, Founder
founders.description:
Dreaming is not enough without the doing.

I am a 26-year-old with over 9 years of experience in both the corporate and the startup world. I define myself as an entrepreneur with an international vision who loves learning and creating added value.

From my experience leading the creation of three startup companies I have learnt the best asset is people, thus when I am part of a team I am resilient, proactive and assertive.

Feel free to send me a DM!

founders.name: Pol Rosell, Founder
founders.description:
I consider myself a born entrepreneur, resilient, with a great capacity to adapt to the constant changes of today's world. 
I love to create solutions that make people's lives easier. Understanding their needs and being able to transform them into a product that helps them in their daily lives. 

I studied economics in Barcelona and I bring my business vision to technology.

# Dynamic sales pricing
haddock's dynamic bill of materials are automatically updated with the last purchase price of each ingredient. **You can see how the margin varies and redefine the selling price of each dish.**

**Company Overview: Haddock**

Founded in 2020 and based in Barcelona, Spain, Haddock is a startup that leverages SaaS technology to support restaurants in boosting their profitability through meticulous cost control. Initially conceived as a fintech solution, the company's platform employs cutting-edge technology—namely Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Optical Character Recognition (OCR)—to streamline how restaurants manage and analyze their financial data.

### **Mission**
Haddock's core mission revolves around enhancing restaurant margins by providing real-time insights into costs. Their application allows restaurant operators to effortlessly digitize documents, such as invoices, simply by taking a picture. This data is then processed and made available in real-time, thus enabling better business decisions based on up-to-date information.

### **Key Features**
- **Real-Time Cost Control:** Users can track their profit and loss statements, margins, price fluctuations, and various insights critical for making informed decisions.
- **Easy Document Management:** The process of documenting expenses is simplified to just uploading a photo of an invoice, eliminating manual entries and the associated chances of error.
- **Integration with POS Systems:** The software integrates seamlessly with multiple Point of Sale (POS) systems, enhancing its utility by providing a comprehensive view of financial performance.
- **Dynamic Bill of Materials:** This feature keeps track of ingredient prices, automatically updating the cost of menu items, which allows restaurant owners to adjust pricing proactively.

### **Team and Growth**
Haddock operates with a dynamic team of 20 employees and is part of the noted Y Combinator Batch W22, which adds credibility to its innovative approach in the restaurant technology space. Their inclusive culture is fueled by a strong commitment to developing tools that genuinely relieve restaurant owners from the intricacies of cost management.

### **Investment and Tags**
Haddock has attracted the interest of investors and partners, including notable groups like Nan. The company is categorized under tags such as 'fintech', 'SaaS', and 'B2B', clearly positioning itself within the intersection of finance and technology tailored for the hospitality sector.

### **Conclusion**
In an industry where margins can be razor-thin, Haddock stands as a beacon of efficiency, helping restaurants mitigate risks associated with cost fluctuations while enhancing profitability. For more information or to explore their offerings, visit [Haddock's website](https://haddock.app).
